Title: PEN15
Writer: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Sam Zvibleman
Actors: Maya Erskine, Anna Konkle, Melora Walters
Plot: The comedic story of middle school seen through the eyes of two 7th grade girls dealing with the awkwardness of being a teenager.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Primetime Emmys. 4 wins & 42 nominations total
